meanings.sent1: Her unrequited love for him left her feeling sad.
meanings.sent2: He felt unrequited longing for the life he once had.
meanings.sent3: The unrequited puppy kept chasing its tail, hoping for a response.
meanings.sent4: The unrequited efforts of the plants to reach the sunlight showed their determination.
meanings.sent5: The unrequited dreams of the young girl filled her with hope.

meanings.sent1: His unrequited debt burdened him with worry.
meanings.sent2: The unrequited loan caused financial strain on the family.
meanings.sent3: The unrequited hunger for dessert made him sneak a cookie before dinner.
meanings.sent4: The unrequited thirst for knowledge drove her to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent5: The unrequited promises of the politician left the citizens disappointed.

meanings.sent1: The unrequited phone calls went unanswered.
meanings.sent2: Her unrequited smiles at him were met with a blank expression.
meanings.sent3: The unrequited high-five left him hanging awkwardly in the air.
meanings.sent4: The unrequited invitations to the party were ignored by most of the guests.
meanings.sent5: The unrequited messages in the group chat made her feel invisible.
